document_data.caption: ''A seawraith, drowning a sailor.''
document_data.name: Seawraith
document_data.mainbody: '''''Seawraiths''''' were aquatic creatures somewhat similar in appearance of regular [[undead]] [[wraith]]s.
document_data.Description: ''Seawraiths'' appeared as emaciated translucent naked [[humanoid]]s with parchment-thin skin and long hair that swirled in the waters of their habitats. Their eyes emanated sinister yellow radiance and mouth were filled with terrifying sharp teeth.
document_data.History: Sometime in the days that followed the [[Spellplague]], seawraiths menaced the city of [[Waterdeep]]. They emerged from the [[Sea of Swords]] to attack ships in the harbors of the City of Splendors and usually driven back into the sea by the agents of the [[Lords of Waterdeep]].
